author: Julie Reiner
description: Stirred, strong and boozy - very boozy. Manhattan/Brooklyn-like. Rye whiskey-based with aromatised wine complexity and apricot brandy adding a touch of fruity sweetness. This riff on a Manhattan is a late-night sipper.
name: The Slope
recipeIngredient: 75 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
22.5 ml Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
